channel.title: Help with max lvls

item.title: Help with max lvls
item.dc:creator: @bobbymoore64 bobbymoore64
item.description:
@bobbymoore64 wrote:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }

right when u change the 135 to 200 then u have to change the 300.0 to 400.0 whats the 300.0 and the 400.0 mean??

Read full topic
